update we_xsfx_lxsp
xh = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xy = #{xy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nj = #{nj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wcmdd = #{wcmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wcxxdd = #{wcxxdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wcrq = #{wcrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qjsy = #{qjsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

fdyspsj = #{fdyspsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spfdygh = #{spfdygh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fdyspjg = #{fdyspjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fdyyj = #{fdyyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spfsjgh = #{spfsjgh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spfsj = #{spfsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fsjspsj = #{fsjspsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fsjspjg = #{fsjspjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fsjyj = #{fsjyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lczt = #{lczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qk = #{qk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qjlx = #{qjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update we_xsfx_lxsp set xh = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xy = #{xy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nj = #{nj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wcmdd = #{wcmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wcxxdd = #{wcxxdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wcrq = #{wcrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qjsy = #{qjsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yjfxsj = #{yjfxsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spfdy = #{spfdy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdyspsj = #{fdyspsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spfdygh = #{spfdygh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdyspjg = #{fdyspjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdyyj = #{fdyyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spfsjgh = #{spfsjgh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spfsj = #{spfsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsjspsj = #{fsjspsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsjspjg = #{fsjspjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsjyj = #{fsjyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lczt = #{lczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lcztdm = #{lcztdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lxsmsj = #{lxsmsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lxsmdd = #{lxsmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rxsmsj = #{rxsmsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rxsmdd = #{rxsmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfasfx = #{sfasfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gxsj = #{gxsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gxcz = #{gxcz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qk = #{qk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qjlx = #{qjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select lcztdm,qjlx from we_xsfx_lxsp where xh = #{studentNumber} order by created_at desc limit 2
select count(*) from we_xsfx_lxsp where xh = #{studentNumber} and qjlx = #{leaveType}
select * from we_xsfx_lxsp where xh = #{studentNumber} and lcztdm not in (#{endState},#{deniedState},#{abnormalState})
select * from we_xsfx_lxsp where xh = #{studentNumber} order by created_at desc limit 2
